# aci_relation_from_bridge_domain_to_l3_outside #

List existing ACI Relation From Bridge Domain To L3 Outside objects with the [terraform query](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/query) command.

For more information about the usage see the official Hashicorp documentation for [importing existing resources in bulk](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/v1.14.x/import/bulk?page=import&page=bulk).

## API Information ##

* Class: [fvRsBDToOut](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvRsBDToOut/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.0(1e) and later.

* Distinguished Name Formats:
  - `uni/tn-{name}/BD-{name}/rsBDToOut-{tnL3extOutName}`
  - `uni/tn-{name}/rsBDToOut-{tnL3extOutName}`
  - `uni/tn-{name}/svcBD-{name}/rsBDToOut-{tnL3extOutName}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Tenants -> Networking -> Bridge Domains -> Policy -> L3 Configurations -> Associated L3 Outs`

## Example Usage ##

The configuration snippet below shows an example for Relation From Bridge Domain To L3 Outside with only required attributes. This snippet retrieves a list of all Relation From Bridge Domain To L3 Outside objects.

```hcl
list "aci_relation_from_bridge_domain_to_l3_outside" "example" {
  provider = aci
}
```

The configuration snippet below shows an example for Relation From Bridge Domain To L3 Outside with filter capabilties.

```hcl
list "aci_relation_from_bridge_domain_to_l3_outside" "example" {
  provider = aci
  config {
    filter = "query-target-filter=eq(fvRsBDToOut.dn,\"uni/tn-{name}/svcBD-{name}/rsBDToOut-{tnL3extOutName}\")"
  }
}
```

## Schema ##

### Optional ###

* `config` - (map) A map that contains all configurable options for the list resource.
    
    ### Optional ###

    * `filter` - (string) A filter to restrict the results of the class query to APIC. See [Cisco APIC REST API Configuration Guide, Release 4.2(x) and Later](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/dcn/aci/apic/all/apic-rest-api-configuration-guide/cisco-apic-rest-api-configuration-guide-42x-and-later/m_using_the_rest_api.html#concept_1B75A78853DD46AABC15B048AAFAD1AD) for more information about composing filter query expressions.
